name: Userstyles - Large Edit On Focus v.4
description: Enlarge the Edit Textarea when you give it the FOCUS (when you click INSIDE). It return to the previous size when you click outside. An Enlarge Icon appear on hover it (Icon from: WPZOOM Developer's pack). You can use it with my other style: Userstyles / Greasy Fork Enhancer Dark-Grey The screenshots show how it work whith From an idea stolen to : Flickr longer comment textarea for photo page by Bushman Thanks to him! ▶ Please Comment and give Feedback if you like this Style :-)
